creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: long panel of tie-dyed silk; fine pleat-like fabric; red to black to red colors; embroidery at ends and down center in floral-like motifs in many colors; fringe and tassels at either end in maroon and turquoise
dimension:
31 5/8 x 106 1/2 in. (80.33 x 270.51 cm) (without fringe)
12 in. (30.48 cm) (object part, fringe)
title: Shambar
